short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows a random Wordle word on the new tab page. Use this extension to improve your Wordle vocabulary.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See a random Wordle word on every new tab. This extension is built to remind you of words, but does not spoil the word of the day. Use this extension to improve your Wordle vocabulary.
